title: Luto Walkthrough - All Chapters And Full Game Guide
description: Luto is an unsettling psychological horror game filled with challenging puzzles that can sometimes leave you scratching your head for extended periods. So, whether you'd like to be guided step-by-step through this creepy horror title or simply need help solving one of its clever puzzles, we've got everything you need in our full game walkthrough below. Let's dive in.Table of Contents [hide]Chapter 1 - It's Happening AgainChapter 1 - It's Happening AgainYou begin the game in a desert on Monday. Move forward until a sandstorm begins. When prompted, press the button displayed on your screen rapidly.When you regain control in the next segment, turn around and leave the bathroom.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Our step-by-step walkthrough will guide you through this unsettling horror experience.
text: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links. Luto is an unsettling psychological horror game filled with challenging puzzles that can sometimes leave you scratching your head for extended periods. So, whether you'd like to be guided step-by-step through this creepy horror title or simply need help solving one of its clever puzzles, we've got everything you need in our full game walkthrough below. Let's dive in.Table of Contents [hide]Chapter 1 - It's Happening AgainChapter 2 - Beyond the NoiseHow to get the hammer in LutoHow to solve the clock door puzzle in LutoChapter 3 - One More TimeWhere to find the stuffed monkeys in the bedroomChapter 1 - It's Happening Again (revisited)Chapter 4 - Thanks for Pushing MeHow to solve the drawings puzzle in LutoHow to solve the TV symbols puzzle in LutoWhere to find the stuffed monkeys in the sketch roomHow to open the chest for the mum's items puzzle in LutoHow to solve the House of Lost Dreams puzzle in LutoChapter 5 - Playing with the TruthHow to solve the hangman puzzleChapter 22 - A Mouth Full of Sand Can't ScreamHow to solve the forward and backward puzzleChapter 3 - One More Time (revisited)Chapter 1 - It's Happening AgainYou begin the game in a desert on Monday. Move forward until a sandstorm begins. When prompted, press the button displayed on your screen rapidly.When you regain control in the next segment, turn around and leave the bathroom.In the hallway, turn left and walk forward. Grab the note resting on the banister to your left, then continue forward and down the stairs on the right.In the next room, walk forward until you reach an entryway table against the left wall. Take a document from the trash beside the table. Afterward, pick up the keys from the table and open the front door of the house.Now, it's Tuesday. Leave the bathroom again, then run when you're told to.Wednesday comes next. Leave the bathroom once more, head down the stairs again, and then interact with the sketchbook on the floor.Now, use the other door in this room to go to the basement. Down here, head to the desk against the back wall, then pick up the card and document sitting on it.Return to the bathroom upstairs and get the keys from the sink. Afterward, go back downstairs and open the front door once again.It's now Thursday. Head back downstairs again and answer the phone on the entryway table.Go back to the basement, this time interacting with the trap door in front of the desk from before, and choose to enter it.Enter the trap door.Chapter 2 - Beyond the NoiseMake your way down the ladder, then pass through the next two doors.In the living room, pick up a sheet of paper from the side table, then head down the hallway to the right of it.On your way down the stairs here, stop and pick up a card sitting in a hole in the wall. Additionally, pick up the little note from the ladder at the bottom of the stairs.Look up at the light above you in the room with the stairs. Notice a hammer there? We need that.You need to get that hammer.How to get the hammer in LutoHead forward and take a right to find another table with a phone on it. Pick up the sketchbook page here, then pick up the phone and press "SOS" three times.This will cause the hammer to fall. Return to the area with the staircase and pick up the hammer from the floor. You'll use this shortly.Backtrack and take a left into the next hallway this time.Down this hallway on the right is a door with clocks around it. To open this door, you need to find seven clocks.You have to find seven clocks to open this door.How to solve the clock door puzzle in LutoFor a clock to count as "found", you just need to interact with it.Continue forward into a bathroom. Clock 1 is in the bathtub.Leave the bathroom and walk back down the hallway. Clock 2 is leaning against the wall next to a vase in front of the glass door.Clock 3 is located halfway up the stairs you originally came down.Now, walk over to where you picked up the phone and look up between two wooden beams to find Clock 4.Continue past the phone and go down the stairs. Down here, you'll find Clock 5 in a chair.Open the next door and follow the hallway to find yourself back in the living room. Clock 6 is beneath the side table.From where you entered this room, head forward into the next hallway and into a lit room on the left to find a card.Leave this room and head the way you came from, stopping at the boarded-off door. Use the hammer to remove the nails here, then enter the room. Clock 7 is on the floor here.Gallery All clock locations. Pick up the drawing beside the final clock and the card on a box in this room, then leave.Return to the clock door, which can now be opened, and enter the next room.Pick up a ripped note on the left and take the stuffed monkey hanging from the ceiling.Return to the phone in the hallway. Dial the number 555-1725.After the dialogue completes, turn and look down the hallway to see a figure that has emerged.Dip into the room on the right and run down the hallway. Eventually, you'll see a little toy ambulance in front of you, so follow it until it crashes into a door, then enter it and walk down the stairs.Take the sketchbook page from the table on the left, then go through the door.Follow the path until you reach the bathroom again. Pick up the note here, then turn around.A coin will be floating in front of you now. Move toward it to trigger a scene.Select any dialogue options here until you wake up inside a cave.Make your way through the cave until you come across a familiar desert. As you did at the beginning of the game, press the button displayed on your screen rapidly when the sandstorm begins. Eventually, the screen will fade to black.Chapter 3 - One More TimeYou're once again in the bathroom. Leave and head down the hallway, stopping to pick up the document on the right before going downstairs.Grab the keys from the entryway table and leave through the front door.You'll now cycle through each day of the week. On Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday, simply leave the bathroom and interact with the document again before heading downstairs, getting the keys, and leaving through the front door.When Friday arrives, a door on the left in the hallway can be opened to reveal a bedroom.Grab the sketchbook page from the desk, then interact with the corkboard. Place the monkey drawing in the slot on the lower right.Next, place the stuffed monkey you found earlier on the bed next to the other one.Look away, and suddenly the stuffed monkeys have disappeared. You'll need to find them around the room now.Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the bedroomFind them on the bookshelf above the computer, then turn around. Find them on the fan above you, then turn around. Find them in the laundry basket to the left of the TV, then turn around. Lastly, find them on the shelf to the right of the TV. Interact with them to get an eyeball.Gallery All stuffed monkey locations in the bedroom. Leave the room, go left down the hallway, and pick up the document on the right once more. Go downstairs, grab the keys, and leave through the front door.You're back in the bathroom. Head downstairs yet again. When you reach the bottom of the stairs, grab the flashlight in front of you and turn it on.Grab the sketchbook page on the front door, then turn around. Pick up and read the stamp on the table near the stairs, then head back up to the hallway.Upstairs, there are four descending photos on the left wall. Interact with the fourth (lowest) one to get a key. You can also grab a document from the back of the fallen picture.Interact with the fourth (lowest) photo to get a key.Go back downstairs and open the little lockbox on the table using the key you just found. Take the tiny Entrance Door from the lockbox. Weird.Head through the opening where the front door once was and walk down a creepy corridor until you reach a dilapidated home interior.Make your way through this linear interior, stopping to grab a card from a metal cart along the way, then go down some stairs to another cave.Walk through the cave until a large storage box is blocking the path forward. Move the crate out of your way, then enter the door.Back in the house, go downstairs to answer the ringing phone.After the dialogue finishes, repeatedly press the button to resist the darkness and head back to the living room to find a door ajar (every other door you approach will slam in your face during this segment).Every door will slam in your face except this one.Open the door and follow the corridor. Open two more doors to find a figure floating on the other side. Continue to resist during this period while walking toward the figure.Interact with the figure and watch the scene here, then walk toward the ladder ahead.Suddenly, the narrator will bring up the pause screen and kick you out of the game. Don't worry: This is meant to happen.Load back in and press "Continue."Walk toward the glowing figure ahead while resisting. Once you reach the figure and it disappears, stop resisting.Chapter 1 - It's Happening Again (revisited)Guess what? You're back in the bathroom.Head to the stairs as usual and go down them. However, they will loop for a very long time. Just keep going until you come to a hole you can descend.Chapter 4 - Thanks for Pushing MeHead forward until you reach a door on the left leading to a room with a blue hue.Enter the room, then pick up the sketchbook page on the left. Take note of the board on the wall here that is missing drawings. We'll be returning later.Leave the room for now.Continue forward, stopping to pick up a note on your right before heading left past a boarded-off door.Up ahead is the bathroom, which now has a tub filled with blood. Go past it and take a left at the fork. Walk up the stairs.Pick up the drawing on the bannister.Return to the fork and take the right path this time. Walk down the stairs.Pick up the drawing on the floor.Next, continue winding through this room until you reach a door with a gate. Interact with the gate and take the Golden Piece.Go back upstairs and turn right into a hallway where only one door is cracked open. Enter the room.Pick up the card on the desk, then go through the next door.Take a left and head in the direction of the boarded-off door ahead. Before reaching it, stop and turn right to see a corridor full of doors.At the end of this corridor of doors is a gate that can be opened with the Golden Piece.At the end of this hallway is a door with a gate. Use the Golden Piece to open it.Go down the stairs and interact with the door here to get the Moon and Sun Knocker and reveal another set of stairs. We'll return here shortly.For now, head back to where the path forked left and right. Take the right path again and enter a corridor full of doors.Take a left while listening for a door with a ringing sound coming from within. It will be the second door on your right.Place the Moon and Sun Knocker on this door, then use it to knock. The door will open, so head inside.Place the Sun and Moon Knocker on the second door on the right, then use it to knock.Answer the phone and go through the conversation.Make your way through this area until you see a glowing blue door at the end of a hallway. Walk toward it, but stop to grab the drawing on a table on your right.Go through the glowing blue door, turn right, and head toward the large gate ahead.Open the gate and pass through it, follow the stairs down, and grab the Silver Piece from the shrine.Go back upstairs and backtrack. Eventually, you'll see a ghost pass in front of a door. Head through that door, take a right, and make your way toward another open door.The ghost will attack you, sending you into a dialogue scene. Select your choices, then you'll wake up the cave yet again.Continue forward until you once again reach a glowing figure. Resist until you reach the figure, then stop resisting.And you're back in the bathroom again. Surprise!Leave the bathroom and return to the room with the blue hue where you saw the board with missing drawings.How to solve the drawings puzzle in LutoYou have to place the drawings in the correct spots:"Look for the signs amidst all the noise" - Drawing of Strange Symbols"Find the childhood that hides from pain" - Drawing of Two Monkeys"Escape for the false prison of memories" - Drawing of a Canarian HousePlace the drawings like this.Now, leave the room and take a left. Follow the path back around to where it forks. Take the left path and go upstairs.There's now a glowing red room at the top with a videotape in a window. Interact with it to make it fall downstairs.Turn around to see a figure has spawned behind you. It won't bother you, so just walk past it and make your way back down the stairs.In a basket by the bathroom ahead is the videotape. Pick it up.Follow the path back around to a room with a bunch of TVs.A TV located in the center of the room says "No Signal," so interact with it and place the videotape inside the built-in VCR.You'll now be controlling a character on the TV.Go down the stairs nearby, then take some more stairs on the left.You'll eventually see some TVs with symbols before the screen goes black and resets you somewhere else.Walk through a sequence of pathways that will constantly reset. Eventually, you'll leave the TV and be yourself (?) again.A new door will now be open directly in front of you, but you don't need to enter it currently.Leave the TV room, then take an immediate right. Go back through the door you opened earlier with the Golden Piece and follow it all the way to the end to reach three TVs.How to solve the TV symbols puzzle in LutoInteract with the glowing red TVs and enter the following symbols from top to bottom:Top TV - SpiralMiddle TV - Single middle line with two half-circles on top and bottomBottom TV - Three triangles (tri-force)Set these symbols on the TVs.A door will now open. Go through it.Follow the left path around until you find a figure wearing glasses in front of a red static screen. Take Sam's Broken Glasses.Turn around to go back. You'll soon fall through a hole.Walk forward, then look to the right and grab the sketchbook page from the banister. Now head back left.Follow the path back to the room with all of the TVs. Leave the room and go forward, heading to the left of the boarded-off door. to reach the fork again.Take the right path and go down the stairs to the room with all the sketches.Pick up the sketchbook page from the crate ahead, then take note of the monkeys once again. Here we go.Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the sketch roomLook at the monkeys hanging from the crate, then turn around. Find the monkeys to the right of the crate on a shelf next to a basketball, then turn around. Find the monkeys hanging from the ceiling behind a sketch, then turn around. Find the monkeys on the ground behind a sketch near a gated door, then turn around. Find the monkeys on a crate near the last spot you found them.Gallery All stuffed monkey locations in the sketch room. Pick up Isaac's Deflated Ball.Now, go over to the gated door and use the Silver Piece to open it. Downstairs, make your way through the linear path until you reach a red valve on a metal cart. Pick it up.Leave the way you came. The screen will start shaking, closing off the door you originally used to come through here. Instead, there's now a small hole you can enter.Walk forward, pick up the coin, and pay no mind to the red spider that pops up. At the end of the corridor, move the crate out of your way.Go down the stairs in the maintenance hallway here to reach a red pipe where you can attach the valve. This will allow you to stop the blood from flowing down the ladder in front of you.Use the valve here to turn off the blood flowing down the ladder ahead.Go down the ladder and walk forward. Pick up Joel's Dull Heart.Go back up and head into the section with the flickering blue light.Directly to your right is an open door leading into a room with a rocking chair and a chest on a table.First, grab the sketchbook page on the table to your right, then the note on the table near the rocking chair.Place the Entrance Door into the door slot located on the photo on the wall.Now, you need to find a way to open the chest.How to open the chest for the mum's items puzzle in LutoThe note you picked up a moment ago gives you hints on how to get the combination for the lock by counting items around the room. But if you want to bypass that process, enter the number: 3715.You'll hear a knock at the tiny door in the frame. Open it. Take Eva's Shattered Photograph from inside.Take Eva's Shattered Photograph from inside the door.Return once again to the maintenance hall and back down the stairs where the large gate was. You'll know it's the right spot if says "House of Lost Dreams" above it.You now have the four items needed to solve the puzzle that awaits you at the bottom.How to solve the House of Lost Dreams puzzle in LutoYou need to place four items on the trays beneath the paintings in this room. There are clues to be found in your sketchbook, but you can skip that altogether using the solutions below:El Amanecer – Eva’s Shattered PhotographEl Mediodia – Isaac’s Deflated BallLa tarde – Sam’s Broken GlassesLa noche – Joel’s Dull HeartAfter placing the items, attempt to leave. A levitating figure will appear, so resist by pressing the button on your screen as usual. Keep doing so as you approach the figure, then interact with it to trigger a scene.When you try to leave again, a painting will fall off the wall to reveal a hole you can pass through.Make your way down the claustrophobic hallway of pictures for a while until the screen goes black, sending you back to... the bathroom again.Leave the bathroom and start down the hallway. A figure will appear and drop into a picture on the floor. Follow it through.You're back in the bathroom, of course. Leave again and walk forward a bit, but do not enter the frame this time. Instead, turn around to find a new staircase has appeared where the bathroom once was.Go down the stairs and through a door into a flooded hallway.At the split, go left. Take a left down a short hallway and enter the door here.When asked to choose left or right, choose left. Afterward, enter the door down the short hallway on the left.When presented with two small hallways, each leading to doors, choose the one with the House For Sale sign near it.Walk down a hallway, turn right to find two more small hallways with doors, and again choose the left one with the House For Sale sign near it.Enter the doors that have House For Sale signs beside them.You'll enter an eerie scene with a figure in front of a moon. Walk toward the moon until the scene ends.Continue through the claustrophobic hallway of pictures until you emerge from the bathroom mirror, then take the note from the door here.Leave the bathroom. You'll be attacked by the figure again.Choose your dialogue options, then you'll be back in the desert, where you'll need to work your way back into the house.Run toward the figure in the distance while resisting. It will disappear when you reach it, but you'll be able to look around and spot another one. Keep running (while resisting) toward it until you reach it, then the screen will close in and... well, you can probably guess where you're headed.Yeah, you're back in the bathroom.Turn around and pick up the coin. Then take a few steps back and enter the door leading into a dark hallway.Chapter 5 - Playing with the TruthContinue forward and down a set of stairs, then take a right and follow the path around to a set of stairs going up.Take the card on the ground at the top of the stairs, then take a left here, and take the stairs leading down on your right at the end of the hallway.In the next room, take the sketchbook page from the table on the right.Up ahead is another fork. Go to the right first and take a card sitting atop a painting, then head back around and go left to grab the Staff Key at the dead end.Backtrack to the level above you and walk forward through the hallway to a door that says "Staff Only". Use the Staff Key to open the door.Use the Staff Key to enter the door.In the Staff Room, wrap around to the left and take the videotape from the stack of boxes, then leave the Staff Room.Walk forward until you find a white door on the left just past the staircase.Interact with the white door multiple times until it finally opens.Inside the next room, touch the TV to insert the videotape, and then you'll find yourself within it as you were before.Walk forward and interact with the figure with an "O" above its head to make it disappear, then continue ahead until you reach a room with multiple figures with letters above their heads.In this segment, you'll need to solve a hangman puzzle.How to solve the hangman puzzleOn the left of the TV are six sheets of paper. You need to spell a specific word by touching the figures with the correct letters above their heads. Below these six sheets is another sheet of paper with a game of hangman that will advance each time you pick an incorrect letter. Once the hangman is finished, you'll be kicked out of the TV and have to start over.As usual, referring to your sketchbook can help you solve this puzzle, but for the sake of moving things along, the correct letters are R-O-M-P-E-R.The solution to the hangman puzzle is R-O-M-P-E-R.The figures are scattered throughout various rooms within the TV world, so take your time and be thorough. It can take a while to find every letter needed.When you complete the puzzle, you'll leave the TV.Leave the room and start backtracking down the stairs toward where the chapter started. At the bottom of the stairs, turn left and enter the door here.Turn right and walk down the hallway of doors. Sprint down this hallway until you hit a box that says "Load Level", causing the screen to go black.Chapter 22 - A Mouth Full of Sand Can't ScreamYou'll wake up in a very dark room. Look around for a coin in the distance and walk toward it.Look for a coin in the distance, then go pick it up.Collect the coin, then head back toward the light behind you until the screen goes black and you start over.This time, listen for a weird sound in the distance and make your way in its direction.Eventually, you'll come across a radio. Interact with it to make it disappear.Follow the weird sound to a radio, then interact with it.Afterward, there will be two more radios to find in the darkness. Follow the sounds to them. Interacting with one of these will spawn a dog bed in the light with a second sketchbook page. The other will be near a table with a sketchbook page you can pick up before you get close to it. It will disappear on its own.When the final radio disappears, you'll spawn in front of a glowing, levitating figure. Resist as usual, pressing forward until you can reach the figure and interact with it to end the sequence.Follow the sound once more to a final radio. Interact with this one to bring up a frequency slider. Move the slider below 53 AM and wait a few moments.Set the slider below 53 AM.A figure will appear and spawn a "Load Level" box in front of you. Enter it.You're back in the hallway of doors. Walk forward and enter the open door on the left.In this room are two boxes: Forward and Backward. It's puzzle time.How to solve the forward and backward puzzleThis one is easier than it looks at a glance.At the end of this area is a major Out of Bounds gap that will teleport you back to the start of the room when touched. The Forward and Backward boxes here will make all the toy ambulances in the room go, well, forward or backward.Spot a toy ambulance on the floor by the door you first entered. Pass through the Backward box, then follow that toy ambulance through the room while bypassing the Forward box altogether.As the toy ambulance reaches the Out of Bounds gap, walk atop it and ride it across to the other side.You'll have to ride this toy ambulance across the Out of Bounds gap.If you mess up and find the toy ambulance is lost on the other side of the Out of Bounds gap, just use the Forward box to bring it back to you and start over.Enter the door ahead and turn left. Answer the phone down the hall, listen to the dialogue, then hang up.Turn around and go up the staircase (where you initially got the hammer earlier in the game).At the top of the stairs, turn left and go through the door here, then walk toward the Play Music box ahead.Head toward the Play Music box.Walk through this corridor, climb the ladder at the end, and interact with the trap door at the top a few times.The narrator will once again kick you out. As last time, this is normal.Load back in and press "Continue" multiple times to cycle through the narrator's dialogue. This can take a while. Eventually, a scene will begin.After the scene, you'll be inside a game called 30/03. This functions as a mini-game where you have to avoid red spiders while collecting hearts to deposit in the center of a building. While there's a trophy/achievement for beating it, failing is the primary method of moving forward in the story, so pause the game and choose to exit.Once this sequence ends, you'll be back in the bathroom, which shouldn't surprise you at all by now.Leave the bathroom and head toward the Trigger Title box ahead. Before you reach it, dip into the area on the left to grab a sketchbook page.Enter the Trigger Title box.Chapter 3 - One More Time (revisited)Open the first door you come to, then head to the end of the room and pick up the keys.Leave the room, continue down the hallway, and walk down the stairs. Interact with the front door.Head forward into the bathroom, then turn around and re-enter the Trigger Title box.Go downstairs again and pass through the Change Day box at the front door.Wrap around and walk through the Increase Speed box, then follow the path until you enter a room with a lot of doors with words above them.Enter the Teleport door.Enter the Teleport door.Walk through the Play Music and Light Candles boxes.When presented with a choice to go left or right, choose either. They both lead to the same place.Walk all the way forward to a metal cart and pick up a card.Now head down the path and through the gate under the words "House of Lost Dreams". At the end of this area, you'll drop back down into the room with all the doors.Walk around the side of this area to spot a radio on a table. Pick it up. This is Joel's Radio. You can take it out and tune it a second time for a trophy/achievement if you wish.Pick up Joel's Radio.Afterward, Work in progress. There are currently no available deals GameSpot may get a commission from retail offers. Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Luto is an unsettling psychological horror game filled with challenging puzzles that can sometimes leave you scratching your head for extended periods. So, whether you'd like to be guided step-by-step through this creepy horror title or simply need help solving one of its clever puzzles, we've got everything you need in our full game walkthrough below. Let's dive in.

Table of Contents [hide]

  • Chapter 1 - It's Happening Again
  • Chapter 2 - Beyond the Noise
    • How to get the hammer in Luto
    • How to solve the clock door puzzle in Luto
  • Chapter 3 - One More Time
    • Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the bedroom
  • Chapter 1 - It's Happening Again (revisited)
  • Chapter 4 - Thanks for Pushing Me
    • How to solve the drawings puzzle in Luto
    • How to solve the TV symbols puzzle in Luto
    • Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the sketch room
    • How to open the chest for the mum's items puzzle in Luto
    • How to solve the House of Lost Dreams puzzle in Luto
  • Chapter 5 - Playing with the Truth
    • How to solve the hangman puzzle
  • Chapter 22 - A Mouth Full of Sand Can't Scream
    • How to solve the forward and backward puzzle
  • Chapter 3 - One More Time (revisited)

Chapter 1 - It's Happening Again

You begin the game in a desert on Monday. Move forward until a sandstorm begins. When prompted, press the button displayed on your screen rapidly.

When you regain control in the next segment, turn around and leave the bathroom.

In the hallway, turn left and walk forward. Grab the note resting on the banister to your left, then continue forward and down the stairs on the right.

In the next room, walk forward until you reach an entryway table against the left wall. Take a document from the trash beside the table. Afterward, pick up the keys from the table and open the front door of the house.

Now, it's Tuesday. Leave the bathroom again, then run when you're told to.

Wednesday comes next. Leave the bathroom once more, head down the stairs again, and then interact with the sketchbook on the floor.

Now, use the other door in this room to go to the basement. Down here, head to the desk against the back wall, then pick up the card and document sitting on it.

Return to the bathroom upstairs and get the keys from the sink. Afterward, go back downstairs and open the front door once again.

It's now Thursday. Head back downstairs again and answer the phone on the entryway table.

Go back to the basement, this time interacting with the trap door in front of the desk from before, and choose to enter it.

Chapter 2 - Beyond the Noise

Make your way down the ladder, then pass through the next two doors.

In the living room, pick up a sheet of paper from the side table, then head down the hallway to the right of it.

On your way down the stairs here, stop and pick up a card sitting in a hole in the wall. Additionally, pick up the little note from the ladder at the bottom of the stairs.

Look up at the light above you in the room with the stairs. Notice a hammer there? We need that.

How to get the hammer in Luto

Head forward and take a right to find another table with a phone on it. Pick up the sketchbook page here, then pick up the phone and press "SOS" three times.

This will cause the hammer to fall. Return to the area with the staircase and pick up the hammer from the floor. You'll use this shortly.

Backtrack and take a left into the next hallway this time.

Down this hallway on the right is a door with clocks around it. To open this door, you need to find seven clocks.

How to solve the clock door puzzle in Luto

For a clock to count as "found", you just need to interact with it.

Continue forward into a bathroom. Clock 1 is in the bathtub.

Leave the bathroom and walk back down the hallway. Clock 2 is leaning against the wall next to a vase in front of the glass door.

Clock 3 is located halfway up the stairs you originally came down.

Now, walk over to where you picked up the phone and look up between two wooden beams to find Clock 4.

Continue past the phone and go down the stairs. Down here, you'll find Clock 5 in a chair.

Open the next door and follow the hallway to find yourself back in the living room. Clock 6 is beneath the side table.

From where you entered this room, head forward into the next hallway and into a lit room on the left to find a card.

Leave this room and head the way you came from, stopping at the boarded-off door. Use the hammer to remove the nails here, then enter the room. Clock 7 is on the floor here.

Pick up the drawing beside the final clock and the card on a box in this room, then leave.

Return to the clock door, which can now be opened, and enter the next room.

Pick up a ripped note on the left and take the stuffed monkey hanging from the ceiling.

Return to the phone in the hallway. Dial the number 555-1725.

After the dialogue completes, turn and look down the hallway to see a figure that has emerged.

Dip into the room on the right and run down the hallway. Eventually, you'll see a little toy ambulance in front of you, so follow it until it crashes into a door, then enter it and walk down the stairs.

Take the sketchbook page from the table on the left, then go through the door.

Follow the path until you reach the bathroom again. Pick up the note here, then turn around.

A coin will be floating in front of you now. Move toward it to trigger a scene.

Select any dialogue options here until you wake up inside a cave.

Make your way through the cave until you come across a familiar desert. As you did at the beginning of the game, press the button displayed on your screen rapidly when the sandstorm begins. Eventually, the screen will fade to black.

Chapter 3 - One More Time

You're once again in the bathroom. Leave and head down the hallway, stopping to pick up the document on the right before going downstairs.

Grab the keys from the entryway table and leave through the front door.

You'll now cycle through each day of the week. On Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday, simply leave the bathroom and interact with the document again before heading downstairs, getting the keys, and leaving through the front door.

When Friday arrives, a door on the left in the hallway can be opened to reveal a bedroom.

Grab the sketchbook page from the desk, then interact with the corkboard. Place the monkey drawing in the slot on the lower right.

Next, place the stuffed monkey you found earlier on the bed next to the other one.

Look away, and suddenly the stuffed monkeys have disappeared. You'll need to find them around the room now.

Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the bedroom

Find them on the bookshelf above the computer, then turn around. Find them on the fan above you, then turn around. Find them in the laundry basket to the left of the TV, then turn around. Lastly, find them on the shelf to the right of the TV. Interact with them to get an eyeball.

Leave the room, go left down the hallway, and pick up the document on the right once more. Go downstairs, grab the keys, and leave through the front door.

You're back in the bathroom. Head downstairs yet again. When you reach the bottom of the stairs, grab the flashlight in front of you and turn it on.

Grab the sketchbook page on the front door, then turn around. Pick up and read the stamp on the table near the stairs, then head back up to the hallway.

Upstairs, there are four descending photos on the left wall. Interact with the fourth (lowest) one to get a key. You can also grab a document from the back of the fallen picture.

Go back downstairs and open the little lockbox on the table using the key you just found. Take the tiny Entrance Door from the lockbox. Weird.

Head through the opening where the front door once was and walk down a creepy corridor until you reach a dilapidated home interior.

Make your way through this linear interior, stopping to grab a card from a metal cart along the way, then go down some stairs to another cave.

Walk through the cave until a large storage box is blocking the path forward. Move the crate out of your way, then enter the door.

Back in the house, go downstairs to answer the ringing phone.

After the dialogue finishes, repeatedly press the button to resist the darkness and head back to the living room to find a door ajar (every other door you approach will slam in your face during this segment).

Open the door and follow the corridor. Open two more doors to find a figure floating on the other side. Continue to resist during this period while walking toward the figure.

Interact with the figure and watch the scene here, then walk toward the ladder ahead.

Suddenly, the narrator will bring up the pause screen and kick you out of the game. Don't worry: This is meant to happen.

Load back in and press "Continue."

Walk toward the glowing figure ahead while resisting. Once you reach the figure and it disappears, stop resisting.

Chapter 1 - It's Happening Again (revisited)

Guess what? You're back in the bathroom.

Head to the stairs as usual and go down them. However, they will loop for a very long time. Just keep going until you come to a hole you can descend.

Chapter 4 - Thanks for Pushing Me

Head forward until you reach a door on the left leading to a room with a blue hue.

Enter the room, then pick up the sketchbook page on the left. Take note of the board on the wall here that is missing drawings. We'll be returning later.

Leave the room for now.

Continue forward, stopping to pick up a note on your right before heading left past a boarded-off door.

Up ahead is the bathroom, which now has a tub filled with blood. Go past it and take a left at the fork. Walk up the stairs.

Pick up the drawing on the bannister.

Return to the fork and take the right path this time. Walk down the stairs.

Pick up the drawing on the floor.

Next, continue winding through this room until you reach a door with a gate. Interact with the gate and take the Golden Piece.

Go back upstairs and turn right into a hallway where only one door is cracked open. Enter the room.

Pick up the card on the desk, then go through the next door.

Take a left and head in the direction of the boarded-off door ahead. Before reaching it, stop and turn right to see a corridor full of doors.

At the end of this hallway is a door with a gate. Use the Golden Piece to open it.

Go down the stairs and interact with the door here to get the Moon and Sun Knocker and reveal another set of stairs. We'll return here shortly.

For now, head back to where the path forked left and right. Take the right path again and enter a corridor full of doors.

Take a left while listening for a door with a ringing sound coming from within. It will be the second door on your right.

Place the Moon and Sun Knocker on this door, then use it to knock. The door will open, so head inside.

Answer the phone and go through the conversation.

Make your way through this area until you see a glowing blue door at the end of a hallway. Walk toward it, but stop to grab the drawing on a table on your right.

Go through the glowing blue door, turn right, and head toward the large gate ahead.

Open the gate and pass through it, follow the stairs down, and grab the Silver Piece from the shrine.

Go back upstairs and backtrack. Eventually, you'll see a ghost pass in front of a door. Head through that door, take a right, and make your way toward another open door.

The ghost will attack you, sending you into a dialogue scene. Select your choices, then you'll wake up the cave yet again.

Continue forward until you once again reach a glowing figure. Resist until you reach the figure, then stop resisting.

And you're back in the bathroom again. Surprise!

Leave the bathroom and return to the room with the blue hue where you saw the board with missing drawings.

How to solve the drawings puzzle in Luto

You have to place the drawings in the correct spots:

  • "Look for the signs amidst all the noise" - Drawing of Strange Symbols
  • "Find the childhood that hides from pain" - Drawing of Two Monkeys
  • "Escape for the false prison of memories" - Drawing of a Canarian House

Now, leave the room and take a left. Follow the path back around to where it forks. Take the left path and go upstairs.

There's now a glowing red room at the top with a videotape in a window. Interact with it to make it fall downstairs.

Turn around to see a figure has spawned behind you. It won't bother you, so just walk past it and make your way back down the stairs.

In a basket by the bathroom ahead is the videotape. Pick it up.

Follow the path back around to a room with a bunch of TVs.

A TV located in the center of the room says "No Signal," so interact with it and place the videotape inside the built-in VCR.

You'll now be controlling a character on the TV.

Go down the stairs nearby, then take some more stairs on the left.

You'll eventually see some TVs with symbols before the screen goes black and resets you somewhere else.

Walk through a sequence of pathways that will constantly reset. Eventually, you'll leave the TV and be yourself (?) again.

A new door will now be open directly in front of you, but you don't need to enter it currently.

Leave the TV room, then take an immediate right. Go back through the door you opened earlier with the Golden Piece and follow it all the way to the end to reach three TVs.

How to solve the TV symbols puzzle in Luto

Interact with the glowing red TVs and enter the following symbols from top to bottom:

  • Top TV - Spiral
  • Middle TV - Single middle line with two half-circles on top and bottom
  • Bottom TV - Three triangles (tri-force)

A door will now open. Go through it.

Follow the left path around until you find a figure wearing glasses in front of a red static screen. Take Sam's Broken Glasses.

Turn around to go back. You'll soon fall through a hole.

Walk forward, then look to the right and grab the sketchbook page from the banister. Now head back left.

Follow the path back to the room with all of the TVs. Leave the room and go forward, heading to the left of the boarded-off door. to reach the fork again.

Take the right path and go down the stairs to the room with all the sketches.

Pick up the sketchbook page from the crate ahead, then take note of the monkeys once again. Here we go.

Where to find the stuffed monkeys in the sketch room

Look at the monkeys hanging from the crate, then turn around. Find the monkeys to the right of the crate on a shelf next to a basketball, then turn around. Find the monkeys hanging from the ceiling behind a sketch, then turn around. Find the monkeys on the ground behind a sketch near a gated door, then turn around. Find the monkeys on a crate near the last spot you found them.

Pick up Isaac's Deflated Ball.

Now, go over to the gated door and use the Silver Piece to open it. Downstairs, make your way through the linear path until you reach a red valve on a metal cart. Pick it up.

Leave the way you came. The screen will start shaking, closing off the door you originally used to come through here. Instead, there's now a small hole you can enter.

Walk forward, pick up the coin, and pay no mind to the red spider that pops up. At the end of the corridor, move the crate out of your way.

Go down the stairs in the maintenance hallway here to reach a red pipe where you can attach the valve. This will allow you to stop the blood from flowing down the ladder in front of you.

Go down the ladder and walk forward. Pick up Joel's Dull Heart.

Go back up and head into the section with the flickering blue light.

Directly to your right is an open door leading into a room with a rocking chair and a chest on a table.

First, grab the sketchbook page on the table to your right, then the note on the table near the rocking chair.

Place the Entrance Door into the door slot located on the photo on the wall.

Now, you need to find a way to open the chest.

How to open the chest for the mum's items puzzle in Luto

The note you picked up a moment ago gives you hints on how to get the combination for the lock by counting items around the room. But if you want to bypass that process, enter the number: 3715.

You'll hear a knock at the tiny door in the frame. Open it. Take Eva's Shattered Photograph from inside.

Return once again to the maintenance hall and back down the stairs where the large gate was. You'll know it's the right spot if says "House of Lost Dreams" above it.

You now have the four items needed to solve the puzzle that awaits you at the bottom.

How to solve the House of Lost Dreams puzzle in Luto

You need to place four items on the trays beneath the paintings in this room. There are clues to be found in your sketchbook, but you can skip that altogether using the solutions below:

  • El Amanecer – Eva’s Shattered Photograph
  • El Mediodia – Isaac’s Deflated Ball
  • La tarde – Sam’s Broken Glasses
  • La noche – Joel’s Dull Heart

After placing the items, attempt to leave. A levitating figure will appear, so resist by pressing the button on your screen as usual. Keep doing so as you approach the figure, then interact with it to trigger a scene.

When you try to leave again, a painting will fall off the wall to reveal a hole you can pass through.

Make your way down the claustrophobic hallway of pictures for a while until the screen goes black, sending you back to... the bathroom again.

Leave the bathroom and start down the hallway. A figure will appear and drop into a picture on the floor. Follow it through.

You're back in the bathroom, of course. Leave again and walk forward a bit, but do not enter the frame this time. Instead, turn around to find a new staircase has appeared where the bathroom once was.

Go down the stairs and through a door into a flooded hallway.

At the split, go left. Take a left down a short hallway and enter the door here.

When presented with two small hallways, each leading to doors, choose the one with the House For Sale sign near it.

Walk down a hallway, turn right to find two more small hallways with doors, and again choose the left one with the House For Sale sign near it.

You'll enter an eerie scene with a figure in front of a moon. Walk toward the moon until the scene ends.

Continue through the claustrophobic hallway of pictures until you emerge from the bathroom mirror, then take the note from the door here.

Leave the bathroom. You'll be attacked by the figure again.

Choose your dialogue options, then you'll be back in the desert, where you'll need to work your way back into the house.

Run toward the figure in the distance while resisting. It will disappear when you reach it, but you'll be able to look around and spot another one. Keep running (while resisting) toward it until you reach it, then the screen will close in and... well, you can probably guess where you're headed.

Yeah, you're back in the bathroom.

Turn around and pick up the coin. Then take a few steps back and enter the door leading into a dark hallway.

Chapter 5 - Playing with the Truth

Continue forward and down a set of stairs, then take a right and follow the path around to a set of stairs going up.

Take the card on the ground at the top of the stairs, then take a left here, and take the stairs leading down on your right at the end of the hallway.

In the next room, take the sketchbook page from the table on the right.

Up ahead is another fork. Go to the right first and take a card sitting atop a painting, then head back around and go left to grab the Staff Key at the dead end.

Backtrack to the level above you and walk forward through the hallway to a door that says "Staff Only". Use the Staff Key to open the door.

In the Staff Room, wrap around to the left and take the videotape from the stack of boxes, then leave the Staff Room.

Walk forward until you find a white door on the left just past the staircase.

Interact with the white door multiple times until it finally opens.

Inside the next room, touch the TV to insert the videotape, and then you'll find yourself within it as you were before.

Walk forward and interact with the figure with an "O" above its head to make it disappear, then continue ahead until you reach a room with multiple figures with letters above their heads.

In this segment, you'll need to solve a hangman puzzle.

How to solve the hangman puzzle

On the left of the TV are six sheets of paper. You need to spell a specific word by touching the figures with the correct letters above their heads. Below these six sheets is another sheet of paper with a game of hangman that will advance each time you pick an incorrect letter. Once the hangman is finished, you'll be kicked out of the TV and have to start over.

As usual, referring to your sketchbook can help you solve this puzzle, but for the sake of moving things along, the correct letters are R-O-M-P-E-R.

The figures are scattered throughout various rooms within the TV world, so take your time and be thorough. It can take a while to find every letter needed.

When you complete the puzzle, you'll leave the TV.

Leave the room and start backtracking down the stairs toward where the chapter started. At the bottom of the stairs, turn left and enter the door here.

Turn right and walk down the hallway of doors. Sprint down this hallway until you hit a box that says "Load Level", causing the screen to go black.

Chapter 22 - A Mouth Full of Sand Can't Scream

You'll wake up in a very dark room. Look around for a coin in the distance and walk toward it.

Collect the coin, then head back toward the light behind you until the screen goes black and you start over.

This time, listen for a weird sound in the distance and make your way in its direction.

Eventually, you'll come across a radio. Interact with it to make it disappear.

Afterward, there will be two more radios to find in the darkness. Follow the sounds to them. Interacting with one of these will spawn a dog bed in the light with a second sketchbook page. The other will be near a table with a sketchbook page you can pick up before you get close to it. It will disappear on its own.

When the final radio disappears, you'll spawn in front of a glowing, levitating figure. Resist as usual, pressing forward until you can reach the figure and interact with it to end the sequence.

Follow the sound once more to a final radio. Interact with this one to bring up a frequency slider. Move the slider below 53 AM and wait a few moments.

A figure will appear and spawn a "Load Level" box in front of you. Enter it.

You're back in the hallway of doors. Walk forward and enter the open door on the left.

In this room are two boxes: Forward and Backward. It's puzzle time.

How to solve the forward and backward puzzle

This one is easier than it looks at a glance.

At the end of this area is a major Out of Bounds gap that will teleport you back to the start of the room when touched. The Forward and Backward boxes here will make all the toy ambulances in the room go, well, forward or backward.

Spot a toy ambulance on the floor by the door you first entered. Pass through the Backward box, then follow that toy ambulance through the room while bypassing the Forward box altogether.

As the toy ambulance reaches the Out of Bounds gap, walk atop it and ride it across to the other side.

If you mess up and find the toy ambulance is lost on the other side of the Out of Bounds gap, just use the Forward box to bring it back to you and start over.

Enter the door ahead and turn left. Answer the phone down the hall, listen to the dialogue, then hang up.

Turn around and go up the staircase (where you initially got the hammer earlier in the game).

At the top of the stairs, turn left and go through the door here, then walk toward the Play Music box ahead.

Walk through this corridor, climb the ladder at the end, and interact with the trap door at the top a few times.

The narrator will once again kick you out. As last time, this is normal.

Load back in and press "Continue" multiple times to cycle through the narrator's dialogue. This can take a while. Eventually, a scene will begin.

After the scene, you'll be inside a game called 30/03. This functions as a mini-game where you have to avoid red spiders while collecting hearts to deposit in the center of a building. While there's a trophy/achievement for beating it, failing is the primary method of moving forward in the story, so pause the game and choose to exit.

Once this sequence ends, you'll be back in the bathroom, which shouldn't surprise you at all by now.

Leave the bathroom and head toward the Trigger Title box ahead. Before you reach it, dip into the area on the left to grab a sketchbook page.

Enter the Trigger Title box.

Chapter 3 - One More Time (revisited)

Open the first door you come to, then head to the end of the room and pick up the keys.

Leave the room, continue down the hallway, and walk down the stairs. Interact with the front door.

Head forward into the bathroom, then turn around and re-enter the Trigger Title box.

Go downstairs again and pass through the Change Day box at the front door.

Wrap around and walk through the Increase Speed box, then follow the path until you enter a room with a lot of doors with words above them.

Enter the Teleport door.

Walk through the Play Music and Light Candles boxes.

When presented with a choice to go left or right, choose either. They both lead to the same place.

Walk all the way forward to a metal cart and pick up a card.

Now head down the path and through the gate under the words "House of Lost Dreams". At the end of this area, you'll drop back down into the room with all the doors.

Walk around the side of this area to spot a radio on a table. Pick it up. This is Joel's Radio. You can take it out and tune it a second time for a trophy/achievement if you wish.

Afterward,

Work in progress.
